attributes.action: Arm all front line police officers with Tazer, in order to save lives and protect the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the continued and increasing threat of violence towards all police officers in the UK, this petition to ask the Prime Minister and Home Secretary to introduce Tazer to all officers, before anymore die in the line of duty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
